Posts.EditableText:
I would like a popup prompt window like the 'yes/no' or 'menu' windows ... but where it just allows the user to answer a question like "What is your name?" .... the main reason for this is consistency of the in game gui ... I prefer the popup windows for system stuff, but its kind of awkward when I have 'What is your name' inline ... but then use the popup menu for the 'gender' choice ... so for right now, I feel like I need to use inline menuing or yes/no prompts ... just for consistency sake.

The bestter solution would probably be a 'script window' feature ... so a new script function, where it creates a popup window like the help or image window that runs a script ... so we could use it to do a variety of 'windowed' things ... from asking questions to showing inventory to whatever ... but my main interest is just the ability to have a windowed prompt that asks a question and fills out a variable for processing.

Thanks for even considering this request.
